select oc.id,o.name as orgName,oc.contactor_position as contactorPosition ,oc.contactor_phone as contactorPhone,c.name as className ,oc.contactor_name as contactorName ,o.star as orgStar,o.id as orgId from org_contactor oc left join org o on oc.org_id = o.id left join class c on c.org_id=o.id where 1=1
and (o.name like '%${param}%' or oc.contactor_name like '%${param}%')
and o.star= #{star}
order by id desc
